name: Jade Hanoi - Hanoi Big City Tour
description:
Hanoi - The capital of 1000 years of culture, the capital for Peace and the second biggest city of Vietnam.
Let's explore this ancient and dynamic city in your own way!


Opt 3 places which you are interested in for your trip:
- The Old Quarter
- Temple Of Literature
- Imperial Citadel Of Thang Long
- Vietnam Museum Of Ethnology
- West Lake
- Ho Chi Minh Complex
(For each plus place, please charge 3$)
